title: Breaking Hammer
description: He would break down any walls; take down his enemies; and search to the ends of the earth to find her. Two years after an unspeakable betrayal by his MC, Joe “Hammer” Holder is fighting his demons, both inside and outside of the cage. He swore he would never fall in love again. Until Meia. But Meia belongs to another man - one with unlimited political connections and power, who ensures her loyalty by holding someone she loves in his grasp. Love is not part of Meia’s destiny. Until Hammer. Can love blossom in the midst of unspeakable pain and loss? And when Meia disappears without a trace, will Hammer’s love be enough to help her survive?
author: Sabrina Paige
